rules.name: myRule_1
rules.label: Entry Criteria for Stage as Report

rules.name: myRule_5
rules.label: Entry Criteria for Stage as Review

rules.name: myRule_7
rules.label: Entry Criteria for Stag as Remedy

rules.name: myRule_9
rules.label: Entry Criteria for Stag as Close

Flow.description: This automation process is used to update problem stages according to entry and exit criteria

value.stringValue: AND([Case].CH_RecordTypeCheck__c , NOT(ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE([Case].Status) , 'Cancelled')), ISPICKVAL( [Case].Status , 'Pending Customer'), NOT(ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE([Case].Status) , 'Pending Customer')))

formulas.name: formula_myRule_11
formulas.expression: AND({!myVariable_current.CH_RecordTypeCheck__c} , NOT(ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE({!myVariable_current.Status}) , 'Cancelled')), ISPICKVAL( {!myVariable_current.Status} , 'Pending Customer'), NOT(ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE({!myVariable_current.Status}) , 'Pending Customer')))

Flow.label: CH_Problem Stage Update
